term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - ion probe microanalysis (IPMA)
term.title: ion probe microanalysis

item.text: Any technique in which the specimen is bombarded by a focused beam of (primary) ions (diameter less than 10 µm) and the (secondary) ions ejected from the specimen are detected after passage through a mass spectrometer.

sources.item: PAC, 1979, 51, 2243. 'General aspects of trace analytical methods—IV. Recommendations for nomenclature, standard procedures and reporting of experimental data for surface analysis techniques' on page 2246 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197951112243)
